Class GameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.environment.Environment
      • GameEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentInterface

    public class GameEnvironment
extends jason.environment.Environment
implements EnvironmentInterface
    The main class of the AgentGame, extending the built in TimeSteppedEnvironment.
    Author:
    Peter Eredics

      • newRound

        protected void newRound()
        Start a new round if the simulation is still active. Do all maintenece task related to rounds.

      • waitEndless

        private void waitEndless()
        Practically stop execution by sleeping in endless loop. Useful to keep windows open until the user closes them to finish the simulation manually.
